Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Anionic pept2 (AP-2, natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (68.33%) toGm anionic pept2This isolated peptide is shorter than that reproted previously from the same insect. K: 17%; N: 15%. GRAVY: -1.007; mol Wt: 4669.206; mol formula: C205H338N50O68; mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: Active against parasite p. promastigotes (IC50 ~ 10 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Patiño-Márquez IA, Patiño-González E, Hernández-Villa L, Ortíz-Reyes B, Manrique-Moreno M.2018
Literature Information.Title: Identification and evaluation of Galleria mellonella peptides with antileishmanial activity.
